problems.title: N-Queens (Count Solutions)
problems.description:
Place N queens on an N x N chessboard so that no two queens attack each other. Using recursion (backtracking), count how many distinct solutions exist.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print the number of valid arrangements.
hintsList: Place one queen per row. For each column, check if column and two diagonals are free; mark them when placing, unmark when backtracking.
